thread.section_title: New product topics in Answer HQ
thread.title: pack luck

author: K
title: pack luck
text: i see all these ea employees saying everyone has the same chance of packing a player but how have i opened close to 1000 packs spent many hours a day building packs in sbcs i’ve spent over £200 and the best thing i’ve had is team of the week donaruma but explain to me how streamers can open less than 10 packs and get one this whole fifa system is utter * and rigged the employees are just petty aswell they know their wrong so they just lock the thread cause they’ve been proven wrong i’ve hit milestone 3 3 times in a row this is probably my most played game and the one i’ve spent the most money on but the one i get jack * out off the gameplay is rigged the packs are * eafc24 is just a useless money grab 1000 packs £200 not a single toty but bateson could open a 30 coin pack and gets mbappe and van dijk on a double walkout probably it’s an utter joke
